author: ajsutton
content: Thinking about this I think it is actually a lot more reasonable to describe the block a duty response is dependent on as metadata. So it provides a neat way to sidestep the compatibility issues and sets what is potentially a useful pattern of a `dependent_root` metadata field to indicate that the response content is dependent on something other than the input parameters.   PR to actually add this to the OpenAPI is: https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-APIs/pull/117

author: jgm
content: The PR looks good to me.  I'm left wondering if we now need the chain_reorg event at all, but at this late stage I'm inclined to leave it and if it turns out to be unnecessary we can deprecate it for v2.
